title: Kimchi Cheese Smile
overview: Kimchi Cheese Smile follows 2 families who go from the picture perfect life to a stage life. Shin Goo runs a photo studio and his kimchee-like common class family is about to become inlaws with Sun Woo Eun Sook's cheese-like rich class family that runs a sports center. With the clash in class and family values, the drama is the comic events that follow when kimchee and cheese are hashed together
